message.body: Matthew. Tim and I have decided that we need to imbibe in the immediate future (Tim won't say "imbibe"). I hope soon.
(1/2) Dear Martha and Tim, i would love to imbibe with you both (is that the correct usage?!)im in msp til july 2 and am free thurs eve. Let me know...im
(2/2) thinking aster cafe patio on the river. It will be lovely, that i promise.
Thursday sounds lovely, promises or no. I think tim said that would work too. Tandem texts aside, I'm super excited to see you, Matt.
Hey :) sounds wonderful. Ill call late morning to finalize details. Until then!
Martha, since it is supposed to rain, how about we do barbette's at 9? Happy hour and alicia wiley start at 10.
Perfect. Do you want me to let Tim know?
Stuck in road work! But hope to be there in 15
